sampled.completion1:
(Myself) I'm the richest in the room,
Bill Gates ain't got a chance of getting a meal. 
My rockets can travel at a speed of light,
His money is just a number in my sight.

I'm on a mission to make space a reality.
My vision is far greater than his,
So much so, he's getting jealous.



The difference is that I don't need an earthly fortune,

Your wealth can't stand a chance against the power of my brain,
My game is too high for your money.

A Tesla on my wrist, the world can be misled 
But no worries, I got a trick or two and I'll out-perform you! 

Billionaire versus billionaire, which one will succeed? 
Bill, the tech industry's a joke on you, please don't be deceived!
